amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for the Department of Commerce International Trade Administration Account by $44 million and reduce funding for the Bureau of the Census Current Surveys and Programs by $8 million and the Periodic Censuses and Progams by $36 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Poliquin amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Poliquin.
